mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mt. Vernon Mansion, East, or River Front.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mansion, south porch and colonnade from the southeast lawn. Mounted on orange board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the stereograph mount reads: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 309 9th St., Washington, D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mount Vernon Views. Label adhered on the reverse reads: Mt. Vernon Mansion, East, or River Front, Showing the long Piazza constructed by General Washington; also, the South Porch, included in the extensions. N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. Only authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Mansion exterior
